name: cowJarEnabled
description: If true, a cow can be squished into a Milk Jar by dropping an anvil on top.

name: cowJarMilkPerTick
description: The amount of milk the cow in a jar generates per tick.

name: compressedCowJarMilkMultiplier
description: Ex Compressum compatibility. Multiplier applied to the milk per tick for Compressed Cow in a Jar.

name: sinkRequiresWater
description: Set this to true if you'd like the sink to require water to be piped in, instead of providing infinite of it.

name: largeCounters
description: Enabling this will make the kitchen counters have twice as much inventory space.

name: disallowOvenAutomation
description: Set this to true if you'd like to disallow automation of the oven (pipes and such won't be able to insert/extract)

name: ovenFuelTimeMultiplier
description: The fuel multiplier for the cooking oven. Higher values means fuel lasts longer, 1.0 is furnace default.

name: ovenCookTimeMultiplier
description: The cooking time multiplier for the cooking oven. Higher values means it will take longer.

name: ovenRequiresCookingOil
description: Set this to true if you'd like the oven to only accept cooking oil as fuel (requires Pam's Harvestcraft)

name: showIngredientIcon
description: Set to false if you don't want ingredients to be marked with a special icon in the recipe book.

name: allowVeryToastedBread
description: Toasting toasted bread again will turn into charcoal (only if no other mod adding toast is present). Set to false to disable.

name: excludedRecipes
description: List of recipe ids that should be excluded from the recipe book.
